body.p: To use the Guest Control File Manager to transfer files, follow these steps.

li.p: Open the Guest Control File Manager. Do either of the following:
In the guest VM, select Machine, File Manager.
In , click the machine name. Click File Manager in the machine tools menu for the VM.
The left pane shows the files on the host system.
In the Guest Control File Manager, enter authentication credentials for a user on the guest system.
The contents of the guest VM file system appears in the right pane of the Guest Control File Manager.
Transfer files between the guest and the host system by using the move and copy file transfer icons.
You can copy and move files from the guest to the host system or from the host system to the guest.
Click Close to end the guest session and the Guest Control File Manager.
